## Welcome to Life Navigator

language.title: Configure Language
language.description: Life Navigator works best when your Obsidian interface language matches the language you write your notes in. Select your preferred language below - if it's different from your current setting, Obsidian will restart automatically to apply the change. Voice features (speech-to-text and text-to-speech) will automatically use your selected language.
language.note: If you select a different language than currently configured, Obsidian will automatically restart to apply the changes. All Life Navigator content, AI interactions, and starter kit files will then be in your selected language. Voice features will automatically work in your chosen language.
language.manualRestart: Please restart Obsidian to apply the language changes.
